column4: I know how to remove it, but I will keep rest of the applications... yeah it suddenly works now.. thanks

if you do not mind the terminal, try aptitude, and skip removing of the other dependencies of ubuntu-desktop by pressing '+' on the header of the corresponding group in the confirmation screen... but probably there is another (more standard) way to achieve the same effect
can you give me a example command of the + operator?
just play around with aptitude, + is for marking as to-be-installed/upgraded, -/_ for marking as to-be-uninstalled
